name: Feedly Wide and Clean -> Like Google Reader (kodx)
additional_info:
2012.12.18 Removed font settings from style, it can be changed from settings in feedly.

Removed gaps from new feedly.

Synced with upstream version 1.9.1

Habrahabr logo fix update.

Reverted to ver.1.6

Synced with upstream version 1.9

Font replacement set to sans-serif, call for action and news bar hidden.

** Set preferred font from feedly settings.
